content: single_crochet rounds 4-7 chain 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet round 8 chain 1 single_crochet in the next 7 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 24 single_crochet round 9 chain 1 single_crochet in the next 6 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 21 single_crochet round 10 chain 1 single_crochet in the next st single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 14 single_crochet round 11 chain 1 single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 7 single_crochet stuff w/ stuffing of your choice round 12 chain 1 flatten top so that there are an even amount of single_crochet in the front and back and slip_stitch the stitches together to seam finish off leaves and stem w/ green join w/ slip_stitch in any st in the last round chain 3 slip_stitch in the next st around the last round to form leaves join w/ slip_stitch to 1st slip_stitch insert hook in the center of the leaves slip_stitch chain 4 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook and ea chain across slip_stitch in the same st as beginning of stem finish off yellow squash foundation round w/ yellow chain 4 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in next chain 2 single_crochet in next chain then single_crochet in next 2 free loops on the other side of the chain 2 single_crochet in last free loop join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 8 single_crochet round 1 chain 1 2 single_crochet in 1st single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in remaining single_crochet join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 10 single_crochet round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in 1st single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 15 single_crochet rounds 3-7 chain 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet round 8 chain 1 single_crochet in the next 3 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 12 single_crochet round 9 repeat round 3 copyright © 2005 by patti gonsalves all rights reserved this pattern is \\www dandeliondreamers com for further information page 3 of 3 round 10 chain 1 single_crochet in the next 2 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 9 single_crochet stuff w/ stuffing of your choice rounds 11-16 repeat round 3 stuff w/ stuffing of your choice round 17 chain 1 single_crochet in the next single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 6 single_crochet finish off stuff w/ stuffing of your choice round 18
